episodes.title: Poia Alpha Branch Davidians Survivor
episodes.description: Branch Davidians survivor Poia Alpha shares her thoughts ahead of Decult 2024. At Decult 2024 a survivor story jam will bring together other cult survivors and give opportunity for connection through

episodes.title: 50,000 New Zealanders affected by cults
episodes.description:
Decult director Anke Richter went on Breakfast (TVNZ) to talk about the lasting harmful impact of high-demand groups in New Zealand and why Decult is addressing this problem with a pioneering cult awareness conference on 19 – 20 October 2024. Watch how presenter Daniel Faitaua can’t get his head around the baffling fact that an estimated number of 50,000 Kiwis are or were in cultic groups.                                           
 
More info: decult.net

episodes.title: Luke Hollis Landscape
episodes.description: Luke Hollis, a survivor of childhood sexual abuse within Jehovah’s Witness, will speak at Decult 2024. Despite efforts to conceal his abuse, his mental health suffered greatly. Now, he uses his story and psychology studies to inspire others. To find out more about our other speakers and panellists, head to our website: https://decult.net/speakers/ #cultsurvivor #excult #excultmember #support #ōtautahi #newzealand #aotearoa #christchurch #savethedate #CultAwareness #cult #decult2024 #cultawareness

episodes.title: Roydon Gibbs Landscape
episodes.description:
Leadership coach and former Jehovah's Witness Roydon Gibbs shares why Decult is so important for him.
For more information and to secure tickets to Decult 2024, visit the links in our bio. 

#cultsurvivor #excult #excultmember #support #ōtautahi #newzealand #aotearoa #christchurch #savethedate #CultAwareness #cult #decult2024

episodes.title: Rachel Lees Landscape
episodes.description: Rachel Lees, an IBLP survivor, is an award-winning New Zealand writer in Tauranga and the author of “Sacred Grooming”. The online memoir details her experience of being hand-selected at 20 and groomed over the years by American fundamentalist cult leader Bill Gothard of the Institute in Basic Life Principles (IBLP). As one of the whistle-blowers which led to the downfall of the Christofascist organisation and resignation of the leader, and then filing a lawsuit against Gothard in 2015, Rachel withstood many personal attacks against her. She is finally pursuing her academic education in the Social Sciences to write and speak more on predatory grooming and the healing that comes from the pursuit of justice.

episodes.title: Dianne Simboro Landscape
episodes.description: “We all have a desire to belong..so I desired to belong to this place” Diane Simboro is a former member of the Moonies, a cult she was part of for 41 years. Now a life coach, she dedicates her new life to empowering survivors of family violence. Drawing on her own experiences, Diane helps survivors understand the roots of family violence in a clear and relatable way. She supports them in letting go of their past, rebuilding confidence, and forging a path toward a brighter future.  #cultsurvivor #excultmember #CultAwareness #decult2024

episodes.title: Laura McConnell Conti Landscape
episodes.description: Laura McConnell Conti, a survivor of ‘The Truth,’ will share her journey within the cult. As a fifth-generation follower in Australia, she left at 19, having endured shunning, spiritual coercion, and family violence. The group exerts control over sexuality, gender, and women’s behaviour. It has a history of covering up endemic levels of child sexual abuse, sexual assault, and family violence across generations. Come and hear her speak at the Decult Conference!

episodes.title: CULT TRIP - Anke Richter returns to “Tantra Island” (Official Trailer)
episodes.description:
In 2018, New Zealand journalist Anke Richter visited Koh Phangan in Thailand to break the story about systemic sexual abuse at Agama Yoga, back then a magnet for ex-pat students exploring neo-tantra. Their “Swami” had just fled the island after multiple rape allegations. The author investigated the disturbing Agama drama and its aftermath for her bestseller “Cult Trip: Inside the world of coercion & control”. In July 2023, she returned to “tantra island” to hold a workshop about cultic dynamics in close proximity to the yoga cult.

Director/Producer: Robyn Jordaan
Director/DOP: Caleb MacDonald 

Watch the full workshop on www.ankerichter.net

episodes.title: ANKE RICHTER VISITS OSHO’S “CASHRAM”
episodes.description:
International journalist Anke Richter, bestselling author of “Cult Trip: Inside the world of coercion & control”, spoke to PALAVER host Shay Horay at the Lyttelton Arts Factory about her 2017 trip to Bhagwan/Rajneesh’s former commune in Pune/India – a bizarre place she would not revisit, given what has since come to light about the infamous guru and the suffering of sannyasin children.
 
Read her story: https://www.stuff.co.nz/entertainment/tv-radio/104522551/journalist-anke-richter-goes-inside-the-cult-of-netflixs-wild-wild-country
 
More about the author and “Cult Trip”: www.ankerichter.net
